title: Ventas Stock Decline Is a Warning to Yield-Hungry Investors
text:
Health-care real-estate investment trust Ventas disappointed investors with its third-quarter earnings report, which was issued before the market opened. The stock fell nearly 8.9% Friday, closing at $66.00, making it the worst stock in the S&P 500 Friday. Management blamed a weak senior housing market causing the firm to revise its 2019 guidance from its senior housing business.
